meanings: (밑으로) fall, drop, (액체가) drip, (지니고 있던 것이) slip
(가격·물가·수준 등이) fall, drop, go[come] down, decline, decrease
have a good[poor] sense of balance
(속담) It is just a coincidence that the two events have happened at the same time.
